abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Michael H Melkonian dismisses suit filed by trade groups representing Korean and Chinese nail salon owners that challenged regulations implement to protect wages of salon workers.
lead_paragraph: Salon owners objected to a new rule requiring them to buy insurance bonds meant to protect low-paid workers from wage theft.

headline.main: New York Court Dismisses Challenge to Nail Salon Wage Protections
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Suit Over Nail Salon Rule

snippet: Salon owners objected to a new rule requiring them to buy insurance bonds meant to protect low-paid workers from wage theft.
